description:
Are you thinking to work on a new product, service or business, but aren’t sure whether the idea you want to pursue is something other people are interested in?

If the answer to this question is yes, then you feel like virtually every business or product owner.

To be 100% sure that the time and money you invest will pay off, it’s absolutely crucial to get accurate feedback from potential clients – and this is where this training comes into play.

Learn How to Take the Best Seat in The House & Learn Proven Tricks To Validate Your Idea With FB Ads

  • Validate Your Product Or Business Idea With FB Ads
  • Estimate The Market Size
  • Set Up Targeted FB Ads To Get Accurate Market Feedback


Content & Overview

This course will introduce you to how to validate your idea with Facebook ads for less than $20.

First, we’ll introduce you to our proven & tested system and why not validating your idea is the biggest mistake you’ll ever make.

Then, I’ll show you how to estimate your market size using a 100% free tool called FB Audience Insights. You’ll be amazed how easy it actually is! We’ll also craft a customer avatar and take the first steps before launching your first FB ad campaign to get market feedback.

Next, you’ll discover how to validate you idea like a pro. I’ll walk you through the process of building a converting landing page, an auto-responder email series and a survey to get solid market data. Moreover, we even included three templates that you can copy-paste to jumpstart the process!

Once the system is in place, I’ll show you how to create a laser-targeted Facebook Ad campaign to drive relevant visitors to your squeeze page, so you can build a list of potential buyers before you have even built the product or launch your business!

By the time you complete the course, you have validated your idea for less than $20 and know exactly whether the idea you have been working on is something you should pursue!
title: How To Validate Your Idea And Succeed In Business
